### PREDICT LINEAR
Predicts the value of a time series at `t` seconds in the future.

```esql
TS k8s
| STATS predicted_cost_int = MAX(ROUND(PREDICT_LINEAR(TO_LONG(network.total_bytes_in), 10), 5)) BY time_bucket = bucket(@timestamp,5minute), cluster
```
